ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Another Nerf (but we can't complain about this one! )
ygData.msgSnippet: At least you high level guys got to have fun anyway.  Of course, I had lots of fun reading all the messages (vicarious thrill I guess)... Gilgurth Bard of 20
ygData.messageBody:
At least you high level guys got to have fun anyway. Of course, I had lots
of fun reading all the messages (vicarious thrill I guess)...

Gilgurth
Bard of 20 Winces (Finally... now if I can only figure out a surname!)
E'CI

-----Original Message-----
From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 18, 2000 8:46 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Another Nerf (but we can't complain about this one! )



At least this time we got to have some fun due to Verant's lackadaisical
testing :) instead of dying horribly in a pool lava.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4
> [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Monday, April 17, 2000 5:11 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Another Nerf (but we can't complain about
> this one!)
>
>
> Even more evidence that Verant doesn't practice quality
> assurance when it
> comes to testing. You would think that this is something
> that would have
> gotten easily caught had they checked it. I mean the whole purpose of
> adding the song was to raise the level cap for charm. After
> testing it
> against a level 38+ mob to see if it worked, the next mob I would have
> tested it against is one I knew it wasn't supposed to work on
> (hmmm perhaps
> a god would be a good choice).
>
> Galtin
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
> Sent: Monday, April 17, 2000 1:39 PM
> To: EQ Bards
> Subject: [eqbards] Another Nerf (but we can't complain about
> this one!)
>
>
> Hot off the www.eqvault.com presses: I guess we can't
> complain as long as
> it's a REASONABLE Cap!
>
>
> Today's patch primarily contained preparations for Kunark,
> including some
> new art. There was also a bug that was fixed with a bard song
> that was put
> in last Tuesday. The song (a charm upgrade) was not capped.
> Someone was kind
> enough to send us a screenshot of someone with a *really
> nice* pet named
> Cazic-Thule.
>
> -Gordon
>
> Slyde Katzenjammer
>
> 39th Level Bard of Xegony
>
>
>
>
>
